ownerCriteria.name: OwnershipType
ownerCriteria.description: The type of ownership: individual, couple, multiple owners, corporate or trust

ownerCriteria.name: NumberOfPropertiesOwned
ownerCriteria.description: The estimated number of properties that are currently owned by the owner of the property

ownerCriteria.name: Deceased
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not the owner has deceased

ownerCriteria.name: OwnerPhoneNumber
ownerCriteria.description: The phone number for any person identified as a current owner or principal of the property

ownerCriteria.name: HasOwnerPhone
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not we have a phone number for any owner of the property

ownerCriteria.name: HasOwnerMobilePhone
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not we have a mobile phone number for any owner of the property

ownerCriteria.name: OwnerEmailAddress
ownerCriteria.description: The email address for any person identified as a current owner or principal of the property

ownerCriteria.name: HasOwnerEmail
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not we have an email address for any of the owners of this property

ownerCriteria.name: OwnerAge
ownerCriteria.description: The age of any owner of the property

ownerCriteria.name: OwnerGender
ownerCriteria.description: The gender of any owner of the property

ownerCriteria.name: MaritalStatus
ownerCriteria.description: The marital status of any owner of the property

ownerCriteria.name: ChildrenAtHome
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not any owner of the property has children

ownerCriteria.name: InBankruptcy
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not an owner of the property is currently in bankruptcy

ownerCriteria.name: BankruptcyStatus
ownerCriteria.description: The current status of the bankruptcy case (Open, Discharged, Dismissed, Closed, Converted)

ownerCriteria.name: BankruptcyRecordingDate
ownerCriteria.description: The date the bankruptcy document was recorded at the county recorder's office

ownerCriteria.name: BankruptcyChapter
ownerCriteria.description: The chapter of the bankruptcy code under which the bankruptcy case has been filed

ownerCriteria.name: BankruptcyDistrict
ownerCriteria.description: Which of the 94 federal judicial districts the bankruptcy was filed in

ownerCriteria.name: HasDivorce
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not a current owner has been divorced after they purchased or otherwise owned the property

ownerCriteria.name: DivorceRecordingDate
ownerCriteria.description: The date the divorce document was recorded at the county recorder's office

ownerCriteria.name: DivorceDecreeDate
ownerCriteria.description: The date the court signed the divorce decree, finalizing the divorce

ownerCriteria.name: MailVacant
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not the owner's mailing address has been identified as vacant by the United States Postal Service

ownerCriteria.name: MailingAddress
ownerCriteria.description: The owner's mailing address per county tax assessor records

ownerCriteria.name: MailingCity
ownerCriteria.description: The owner's mailing city per county tax assessor records

ownerCriteria.name: MailingZipCode
ownerCriteria.description: The owner's zip code per county tax assessor records

ownerCriteria.name: MailingState
ownerCriteria.description: The owner's state per county tax assessor records

ownerCriteria.name: MailingAddressComplete
ownerCriteria.description: Whether or not the owner's mailing address is complete and not Unknown

ownerCriteria.name: MailCongressionalDistrict
ownerCriteria.description: The number of the owner's congressional district within the state, based on their mailing address

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts one or more values, which are OR'd together. Example: ["97202", "97212"]
criteriaTypes.Multiple Values Beginning With: Similar to Multiple Value, except an exact match is not required; properties will be found if they merely begin with the given value. Example: ["123", "910-021-669-000"]
criteriaTypes.Boolean: Accepts either integer 1 or 0. Example: [1] means the property must have this attribute, [0] means it must not have it.
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values. Example: [[100000, null]] returns properties having values from $100,000 to infinity. [[null, 100000]] returns properties with up to $100,000.
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range Including Unknowns: Same as Multiple Range, but when null is used as the left (minimum) end of the range, unknown values are included in the results.
criteriaTypes.Relative Date: Accepts preset date strings like 'Last 30 Days' or specific dates and date ranges using a from: to: syntax. Example: ["Last 7 Days", "from: 1/1/2023 to: 1/31/2023", "1/1/2028"]
criteriaTypes.Relative Date Including Unknowns: Same as Relative Date but when the from: section is left empty, includes properties for which we don't know the value for that field.
criteriaTypes.Single Value: Like Multiple Value but accepts only one value.
criteriaTypes.PropertyType: A special format combining both our list of simple property types known as PType along with our AdvancedPropertyTypes.
